comment.author: 46446237@N08
comment._content:
VERY appreciated ! -- 

This scene could possibly pass for how downtown Seattle looked a MERE-MERE 160 some years ago when the first settlers arrived !
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Words of - Daniel J. Evans, former U.S. Senator, and Govenor,  Washington State).
“When I walk among these mountains I realise how little has changed since the last ice age. 
I thank God that our forefathers had the wisdom to preserve this vast wilderness, - 
and hope that we will be {as vigilant in our responsibility} to maintain its natural beauty.
